forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with scattered thunderstorms this morning, mainly cloudy during the afternoon with a few showers. High 13C. SW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 54F. SW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
